case.title: Users should be able to get on the "Home" page from other pages by clicking the "Conduit" logo
Users should be able to get on the "Home" page from other pages by clicking the "Home" header
The banner with the words "Conduit A place to share your knowledge." should be on the green background
All the article content should place in the Feed section, which contains two tabs: "Your feed" and "Global feed"
The "Your feed" tab should contain only the articles of the users the user is following. Empty by default
The "Global feed" tab should contain the articles of all users.
The articles should be sorted from the newest to the oldest on the "Global feed"
Pagination should be under the list of articles
The pagination should contain pages from 1 to 50, with 10 articles per page
Users should be redirected to the User page after clicking the username of the author of the article
Users should be redirected to the Article page after clicking the title, the description, or the "Read more..." link
Logged-in users should be able to see the number of likes and like an article
User should be able to like the article by clicking the [Like] button on the right of the article section
Users should be able to unlike the article liked by him before by clicking the [Like] button on the right of the article section
The "Popular tags" section should be on the right of the Feed section
Users should be able to get articles that contain a certain tag from the "Popular tags" section after clicking a tag from it
Logged-in users should be able to reach "New Article" page from the header section between the "Home" and "Settings" links.
Not logged-in users should be redirected to the "Sign In" page if they try to reach "New Article" page by direct link
The main fields on the page should be "Article Title", "What's this article about?" and "Write your article"
The optional field on the page should be "Enter tags"
The error message "Title of the article can't be empty (minimum 5 symbols)" should appear " when users leave the "Article title" field empty
The warning message should appear: “Article with the similar Title already exists. Do you want to continue?” when users try to create an article with a non-unique title on the "Article title"
Users should be able to create a new article by filling in 5 characters include letters, numbers, special characters, spaces in the "Article title" field
Users should be able to create a new article by filling in 240 characters include letters, numbers, special characters, spaces in the "Article title" field
Users should be able to create a new article by filling in between 5 and 240 characters include letters, numbers, special characters, spaces in the "Article title" field
Users should not be able to create a new article by filling in less than 5 characters include letters, numbers, special characters, spaces in the "Article title" field
Users should not be able to create a new article by filling in more than 240 characters include letters, numbers, special characters, spaces in the "Article title" field
Error message should appear "Description of the article can't be empty (minimum 5 symbols)" when users leave the "What's this article about?" field empty
Users should be able to create a new article by filling in 5 characters include letters, numbers, special characters, spaces in the "What's this article about?" field
Users should be able to create a new article by filling in 240 characters include letters, numbers, special characters, spaces in the "What's this article about?" field
Users should be able to create a new article by filling in between 5 and 240 characters include letters, numbers, special characters, spaces in the "What's this article about?" field
Users should not be able to create a new article by filling in less than 5 characters include letters, numbers, special characters, spaces in the "What's this article about?" field
Users should not be able to create a new article by filling in more than 240 characters include letters, numbers, special characters, spaces in the "What's this article about?" field
Error message should appear "Body of article can't be blank." when users leave the "Write your article" field empty
The "Write your article" field should not accept any attachments
Users should be able to create a new article by filling in 20 characters include letters, numbers, special characters, spaces in the "Write your article" field
Users should be able to create a new article by filling in 9000 characters include letters, numbers, special characters, spaces in the "Write your article" field
Users should be able to create a new article by filling in between 20 and 9000characters include letters, numbers, special characters, spaces in the "Write your article" field
Users should not be able to create a new article by filling in more than 9000 characters include letters, numbers, special characters, spaces in the "Write your article" field
Users should not be able to create a new article by filling in less than 20 characters include letters, numbers, special characters, spaces in the "Write your article" field
Users should be able to slide down the right corner of the text area to change its size in the "Write your article" field
Users should be able to create tags for his article for future sorting in the "Enter tags" field
Each tag should start from "#" symbol in the "Enter tags" field
Tags should not be case sensitive in the "Enter tags" field
Tag should contain 2 symbols include only letters and numbers, and “#” symbol at the beginning in the "Enter tags" field
Tag should contain 30 symbols include only letters and numbers, and “#” symbol at the beginning in the "Enter tags" field
Tag should contain between 2 and 30 symbols include only letters and numbers, and “#” symbol at the beginning in the "Enter tags" field
Tag should not contain less than 2 symbols include only letters and numbers, and “#” symbol at the beginning in the "Enter tags" field
Tag should not contain more than 30 symbols include only letters and numbers, and “#” symbol at the beginning in the "Enter tags" field
Article can contain 10 tags on the "Enter tags" field
Article can contain between 1 and 10 tags on the "Enter tags" field
Article should not contain more than 10 tags on the "Enter tags" field
Users should be able to create an article by clicking on the [Publish Article] button
Users should be able to create an article by pressing an Enter button
All information entered in the "New Article" screen should disappear when users leave the site without publishing
Users should get redirected to the "Article" page after the successful publication of an article
The "Settings" screen should allow registered users to edit their profile information.
Logged-in users should be able to reach "Settings" page from the header
The system should automatically redirect users to the "Sign In" form when not logged-in users try reaching "Settings" form by link
URL of profile picture" field should be optional field - the user should able to submit the settings form with an empty field
User should be able to enter only one link into "URL of profile picture" field
User should not be able to enter more than one link into "URL of profile picture" field
Error message "Username can't be blank." should appear when users submits the settings form with an empty "Username" field
"Username" field should contain the username of the user
Users should be able to change username by filling in a "Username" field with 4 characters including letters and numbers
Users should be able to change username by filling in a "Username" field with 36 characters including letters and numbers
Users should be able to change username by filling in a "Username" field with between 4 and 36 characters including letters and numbers
Users should be able to change username by filling in a "Username" field with less than 4 characters including letters and numbers
Users should be able to change username by filling in a "Username" field with more than 36 characters including letters and numbers
Username be unique in the "Username" field
"Short bio about you" field should be optional field
Users should be able to add text by filling in a "Short bio about you" field with 9000 characters including letters and numbers, special characters
Users should not be able to add text by filling in a "Short bio about you" field with more than 9000 characters including letters and numbers, special characters
"Email" field should be mandatory - error message "Email can't be blank." should be appear when users leave "Email" field empty
Email should be unique in the "Email" field
"Email" field should have the format [name]@[domain].[top-domain]
Users should be able to change email address by filling in the "Email" field with Latin letters, digits, plus (+), hyphen (-)
"New password" should be optional field
Password should not be the same as the previous in the "New password" field
Users should be able to change their password by filling in 8 characters including letters, numbers, special characters in the "New password" field
Users should be able to change their password by filling in 30 characters including letters, numbers, special characters in the "New password" field
Users should be able to change their password by filling in with between 8 and 30 characters including letters, numbers, special characters in the "New password" field
Users should be able to change their password by filling in with less than 8 characters including letters, numbers, special characters in the "New password" field
Users should be able to change their password by filling in with more than 30 characters including letters, numbers, special characters in the "New password" field
The input should be covered by the password mask (****) in the "New password" field
The new profile picture should appear near the username in the upper right corner of the page if "URL of profile picture" field was updated
User should be able to log in with the new email if the "Email" field was updated
Users should not be able to log in with the old email if the "Email" field was updated
Users should be able to log in with the new password if the "Password" field was updated
Users should not be able to log in with the old password if the "Password" field was updated
Users should be redirected to the Home page and is logged out after clicking the [Or click here to logout] button
The User page should contain information about the user who is currently logged in
Logged-in users should be able to reach "User" page from the header with their username in the upper right corner of the page.
Users should be redirected to the Settings screen after clicking the [Edit Profile Settings] button
The "My Articles" tab should contain the articles written by the user
The "Favorited Articles" tab should contain the articles liked by the user
The articles should be sorted from the newest to the oldest
Users should be redirected to the Article page after clicking the title in the "Favorited Articles" tab
Users should be redirected to the Article page after clicking the description in the "Favorited Articles" tab
Users should be redirected to the Article page after clicking the title, the "Read more..." link in the "Favorited Articles" tab
Users should be redirected to the User page of another user after clicking the username of the author of the article in the "Favorited Articles" tab
Users should be able to like the article by clicking the "Like" button on the right of the article section
Users should be able to unlike the article liked by their before by clicking the "Like" button on the right of the article section
Users should be able to read the content on the "Article" page
Users should be able to leave comments on the "Article" page
Authors of the article should be able to edit their articles
Authors of the article should be able to delete their articles
Users should be able to get on the "Article" page after creating the article
Users should be able to get on the "Article" page from the "Global feed" tab
Authors should be able to observe their articles in the "My posts" tab on the “User page”
User's avatar should redirects to "User page" by click
User's name should redirects to "User page" by click
The [Edit article] button should be available only for the author of the article
The [Delete article] button should be available only for the authors of the article
Users should be able to create a comment by entering 1 character and clicking on the [Post Comment] button in the "Write a comment…" field
Users should be able to create a comment by entering 240 character and clicking on the [Post Comment] button in the "Write a comment…" field
Users should be able to create a comment by entering between 1 and 240 character and clicking on the [Post Comment] button in the "Write a comment…" field
Users should not be able to create a comment by entering more then 240 character and clicking on the [Post Comment] button in the "Write a comment…" field
Users should not be able to create a comment without filling in the "Write a comment..." field
Under the comment form should be a list of published comments
The [Delete] the comment button should only delete the author's comment
Users should be able to edit previously created articles in the "Edit article" screen
The Article page should open when not the author tries to get on the "Edit Article" screen by link
The [Edit article] button should confirm the validation of the "Edit article" form and save the changes made
Users should be able to click on the [Edit article] button without any changes added
Error message should appear above each empty field if any of the required fields are not filled in
The [Cancel] button should return users to the "Article" page without saving the changes
All the article content should place in the Feed section, which contains one tab "Global feed"
Not Logged-in users should not be able to see the number of likes and like an article
Users should be able to open the Sign In page after clicking on the “Sign in” link in the Conduit navigation bar
The “Sign in” page should contain a form with "Email" and "Password" fields
"Email" field should contain a placeholder: "Enter your email"
Users should be able to redirect to the "Sign up" page by clicking on the "Need an account?" link
Users should be able to redirect to the “Forgot password” page by clicking on the "Forgot the password?" link
Users should not be able to copy values from the "Password" field
Users should not be able to cut values from the "Password" field
Users should be able to paste data into the 'Password" field
Users should be able to log in by entering all the required fields with valid data and clicking on the [Sign In] button
Users should not be able to log in by entering all the required fields with invalid data
A validation message "Email can’t be blank" should appear when users do not fill in the "Email" field on the "Sign in" page
A validation message "Password: can't be blank" should appear when users do not fill in the "Password" field on the "Sign in" page

A validation message "Entered Invalid password! Check your keyboard layout or Caps Lock. Send a one-time password to your email?" should appear when users fill in an invalid password in the "Password" field on the "Sign in" page
The user should not be able to log in with invalid email
Users should be able to log in by pressing an Enter button
A validation message "User with such email not registered." should appear when users fill in an unregistered email address in the "Email" field on the "Sign in" page
Click on the “Send one-time password” link in the message should redirect users to the “Forgot password” page.
Authorized users should be redirected to the personal account page when they try to get to this page via a direct link
Users should be able to open the “Sign Up” page from the navigation bar
The “Sign up” form should contain the "Username" field
The “Sign up” form should contain the "Email" field
The “Sign up” form should contain the "Password" field
The “Sign up” form should contain the "Confirm password" field
User should be able to register with all required fields
User should not be able to register without filling in any field
"Username" should be unique - a validation message "This username is taken." should appear when users enter an already taken username
Users should be able to register by filling in a "Username" field with 3 characters including letters and numbers where "Username" starts with the letter
Users should be able to register by filling in a "Username" field with 4 characters including letters and numbers where "Username" starts with the letter
Users should be able to register by filling in a "Username" field with 40 characters including letters and numbers where "Username" starts with the letter
Users should be able to register by filling in a "Username" field with 39 characters including letters and numbers where "Username" starts with the letter
Users should not be able to register by filling in the "Username" field with less than 3 characters
Users should not be able to register by filling in the Username field with more than 40 characters
Users should be able to register by filling in a "Username" field with between 3 and 40 characters including letters and numbers where "Username" starts with the letter
Users should not be able to register by filling in the field "Username" with special characters
Users should not be able to register by filling in the field "Username" with non-printing symbols
Users should be able to register with valid email addresses
Users should not be able to register with invalid email addresses
Email addresses should be unique - a validation message "This email is taken. Want to log in?" should appear when users enter an email that is already registered
Users should be able to register by filling in the "Email" field with Latin letters
Users should be able to register by filling in the "Email" field with Latin letters and digits
Users should be able to register by filling in the "Email" field with Latin letters, digits, plus (+)
Users should be able to register by filling in the "Email" field with Latin letters, digits, plus (+), hyphen (-)
Users should be able to register by filling in the "Password" field with 8 characters including at least one special character, one digit, one capital letter.
Users should be able to register by filling in the "Password" field with 30 characters including at least one special character, one digit, one capital letter.
Users should be able to register by filling in the "Password" field with 29 characters including at least one special character, one digit, one capital letter.
Users should be able to register by filling in the "Password" field with 9 characters including at least one special character, one digit, one capital letter.
Users should not be able to register by filling in the "Password" field with less than 8 characters
Users should not be able to register by filling in the "Password" field with more than 30 characters
Users should be able to register by entering the same data in the "Confirm password" field as in the "Password" field
Users should not be able to register by entering different data in the "Confirm password" field and in the "Password" field
Users should be able to create an account by clicking on the [Sign Up] button
Users should be able to create an account by pressing the Enter button
Users should be able to receive a confirmation email after successful registration
Users should be redirected to the “Finish Registration” page to enter the code sent by email after successful registration
Users should be able to go to the “Sign In” page by clicking on the “Have an account?” link
A validation message "Username must start with a letter, have no spaces, and be 3 - 40 characters." should appear when users enter a username that does not meet the conditions
A validation message "This email does not seem valid." should appear when users enter an email without the "@" sign

A validation message "Password can't be blank. Password must contain at least one capital letter, one number, and one special character." should appear when users enter a password that does not meet the condition
Unlogged users should not be able to get on the "Edit article" screen
The Article page should open when not logged tries to get on the "Edit Article" screen by link
